title: Darius Gameplay (specifically with the Dunkmaster skin)
body: The game will be fine for the first few minutes until he really struggles to land a basic attack on anything. He'll start the animation but it'll cancel halfway through and he'll start to walk until he's at the 12:00 (directly behind) of whatever he's attacking, then continue to attack. This happens against minions (which makes it impossible to cs in lane), champions, monsters, and turrets alike. Not sure if this is the bug that is being looked at, but since he's down at the moment, I thought I'd just leave this here

replies.body:
Hey Draconist,

Thanks for the report! We think there may be an issue with Darius as a champion, as opposed to the skin alone. He's currently disabled while we investigate the issue and work on a fix.
